name: Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft
nested: ['{"severity":"Moderate","headline":"Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 3:14PM MDT by NWS Great Falls MT","description":"At 313 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of gusty showers\\nand isolated thunderstorms in far southern Beaverhead, Madison, and\\nGallatin counties, moving northeast at 25 mph.\\n\\nHAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph.\\n\\nSOURCE...Radar indicated.\\n\\nIMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around\\nunsecured objects.\\n\\nLocations impacted include...\\nWest Yellowstone, Lima, Monida, Dell, Bannack Pass, Red Rock Pass,\\nLakeview, Yellowstone Village, Targhee Pass, Snowline, Raynolds Pass,\\nand Monida Pass.","onset":"2025-08-14T15:14:00-06:00","certainty":"Observed","ends":null,"instruction":"If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Isolated\\nlightning strikes will be possible with this activity.","event":"Special Weather Statement","name":"Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft","id":"MTZ328"}']
